QuestData.Title: Kua'fon's Day Off
QuestData.Description:
A messenger came from de Terrace of de Chosen. Your companion is at it again.
<Wingminder Goja chuckles.>
Not even de priests of Pa'ku seem to be able to convince him to leave. You should go and send him back home, where he belongs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kua'fon at the Terrace of the Chosen and send him home.
